text: Vallavilai is a fishing village in Kollankodu panchayat, Kanyakumari district, Tamil Nadu, India. As of 2011 India census Vallavilai had a population of 10282. Males constitute 51% of the population and Females 49%. Vallavilai has an average literacy rate of 86%, higher than the national average of 59.5%. Male literacy is 78% and female 75%. In Vallavilai 11% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==Places of Worship== *St. Mary's Church *St. Antony's Crusade *St. Jude's Crusade *Mosque *Sri Rajarajeshwari Ishakkiamman Temple ==Education== * Little flower Nursery School * St. Jude's Middle School * Government Primary School ==References== Category:Villages in Kanyakumari district
title: Vallavilai
